description: String displayed between after and before date pickers

This is a label in a drop down selector, to filter a search by dates. The user selects a range of dates including a start and end date. In English this would be the first part of a phrase like 'Report published between February 3, 2022 and February 9, 2022'.

This is a label in a drop down selector, to filter a search by dates. The dates are relative to the current day and in English this would be the first part of a phrase like 'Report published less than 10 months ago'.
This is a label in a drop down selector, and will appear a sentence format like 'Report published less than 3 days ago'.
This is a label in a drop down selector, and will appear a sentence format like 'Report published less than 3 weeks ago'.
This is a label in a drop down selector, and will appear a sentence format like 'Report published less than 3 months ago'.
This is a label in a drop down selector, and will appear a sentence format like 'Report published less than 3 years ago'.
